title: Who am I ?
about: Hello! My name is Pedro and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 when I start to create a website about an pc game then start creating websites using cms (joomla)!Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working as web develloper for 3 years.My main focus these days is building and delivering high-quality Front-end solutions.
stats: Numbers are always fun. Here's some stats about my personal and work life.
tracks: Curious what I'm currently jamming to? Here's my top tracks on Spotify updated daily.
